feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.4: Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Security: Update selentium-webdriver (#3257) Thanks for reporting @jeremymaes!

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-rails from 2.30.3 to 2.31.0 (#3255) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1082.0 to 1.1083.0 (#3254) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.47.0 to 1.49.0 (#3252) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard-performance from 1.7.0 to 1.8.0 (#3251) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump brakeman from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 (#3249) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.6.0 to 0.6.1 (#3248) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1081.0 to 1.1082.0 (#3247) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-ast from 1.43.0 to 1.44.0 (#3245) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump irb from 1.15.1 to 1.15.2 (#3244) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump brakeman from 7.0.0 to 7.0.1 (#3242) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1080.0 to 1.1081.0 (#3243) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.53.4

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.5: Language String, Messaging & Key Rotation Support
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix the Spanish translation link (#3262) Thanks @alex-arce!
  • Preview: Improved expiration message (#3258) Thanks @guntherv73!

:rocket: Features

  • Encryption: Add ability for key rotation (#3261) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.7: Reduce Memory Footprint
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This release changes the application process to run in single mode. This should reduce memory use down to ~300MB. If you disable the background worker with PWP__NO_WORKER=true, then it is ~200MB.

:rocket: Features

  • Memory: Run Puma in single mode (#3277) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.222.1 to 3.222.2 (#3274) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump connection_pool from 2.5.0 to 2.5.1 (#3275) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1087.0 to 1.1088.0 (#3273) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump ffi from 1.17.1 to 1.17.2 (#3272) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.9: Latest Language Strings & New Analytics Support
entry.content:
Big updates to the Ukrainian language strings thanks to @SystemNickDev!

Added support for @plausible analytics (Plausible.io) with configuration docs.

:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#3322) @pglombardo
  • Add Plausible Analytics Support (#3296) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.222.3 to 3.223.0 (#3319) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.184.0 to 1.185.0 (#3318) @dependabot[bot]

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1094.0 to 1.1095.0 (#3309) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.5.7 to 0.5.8 (#3308) @dependabot[bot]
